mean_cn: n.两栖动物；水陆两用飞机和车辆；  adj.【车辆】水陆两用的
mean_en: an animal (such as a frog or toad) that can live both on land and in water
sentence: Amphibians like frogs often start out living in water and later live on land.
sentence_trans: 像青蛙这样的两栖生物通常先在水里生活，然后在陆地上生活。
word_etyma: amphi两个+bi生命+an有…性质→两个生命→两栖动物
